modName: Thieves Guild and Dark Brotherhood male armor re-texture
summary: Re-texture of Thieves Guild and Dark Brotherhood male armor sets to make all pieces black.  They match each other, and the Nightingale armor set nicely
descriptionHtml:
A simple re-texture of the Male versions of the Thieves Guild and Dark Brotherhood armor sets.  The brown Thieves Guild armor is changed to black, as are the red portions of the Dark Brotherhood armor set.  Pieces now mach each other well, along with matching the existing Nightingale armor set.  Now all your Thief and Assassin armor will match in any combination. 

The Main File download includes both armor sets, but the Thieves Guild set seems to be more popular, so I have added individual downloads for both sets as Optional files.

Feedback is welcome, but don\'t expect any chances as I am done playing my Thief/Assassin character for now to try out a Mage.  If you would like to make your own tweaks, go right ahead.  Please give credit if you re-post with changes.

To Install: Extract the content of the file to your Skyrim data folder
author: Bovey
